title: Risk and Return in Investing
description: A comprehensive exploration of the fundamental relationship between investment risk and potential returns, including tools for assessing risk tolerance, understanding market volatility, and making informed investment decisions aligned with personal financial goals.
learning_objectives: Analyze the relationship between investment risk and potential returns
Evaluate different types of investment risk including systematic and unsystematic risk
Calculate and interpret key risk metrics including standard deviation, beta, and Sharpe ratio
Assess personal risk tolerance and match investments to individual risk profiles
Create age-appropriate investment strategies that balance risk and return objectives

skill_builder.title: Risk-Return Investment Analyzer
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students explore different investment scenarios, assess risk-return tradeoffs, calculate risk metrics, and build portfolios aligned with various risk tolerance levels and time horizons.
